quotes: Don't let anyone define you. You define yourself.
There is only one thing in the world worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.
If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time.
Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
If the misery of the poor be caused not by the laws of nature, but by our institutions, great is our sin.
You're always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
Don't bother people for help without first trying to solve the problem yourself.
He that can have patience can have what he will.
Decide upon your major definite purpose in life and then organize all your activities around it.
Only by acceptance of the past, can you alter it.
Giving is the secret of a healthy life. Not necessarily money, but whatever a person has of encouragement, sympathy and understanding.
Everyone has the right to make his own decisions, but none has the right to force his decision on others.
Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work hard at it.
Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
True love stories never have endings.
You have the freedom to be yourself, your true self, here and now, and nothing can stand in your way.
No matter who you are, we're creatures of habit. The better your habits are, the better they will be in pressure situations.
Difficult and meaningful will always bring more satisfaction than easy and meaningless.
Sometimes, the only way to evolve is to open ourselves fully.
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Love is the expression of one's values.
If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.
Each problem has a positive side.
All animals except man know that the principal business of life is to enjoy it.
Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
Adventure is not outside man; it is within.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
To know your Enemy, you must become your Enemy.
There's no next time. It's now or never.
Allow motion to equal emotion.
Fear is your worst enemy. Risk is your best friend.
Too much sanity may be madness and the maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be.
Be confident, not certain.
Note that this journey is uniquely yours, no one elses. So the path has to be your own.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Fear of death is fear of surrender to Infinity. Learn to surrender, to exist at Infinity while alive, and fear of death dissolves.
Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
Unless a man is master of his soul, all other kinds of mastery amount to little.
Words are the clothing of our thoughts.
There is nothing in the world so irresistibly contagious as laughter and good humor.
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
There's no coming to consciousness without pain
Those who seek the easy way do not seek the true way.
It is difficult to free fools from the chains they revere.
When you're the only sane person, you look like the only insane person.
You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.
It is useless to attempt to reason a man out of a thing he was never reasoned into.
Make no small plans for they have no power to stir the soul.
